Torai: Well well well! It seems like the old Orc has some vinegar left in him yet. My father told me about that old geezer bothering him when I was born, saying that I had the power of Pa'agrio or something... Now he's back. Just give me the stone and I'll do this quickly. Don't bother me again. [Quest _374_WhisperOfDreams1 reply_1|Give him the Mysterious Stone.]
